Text:
<UNIDENTIFIED PERSONNEL DETECTED>
<ACTIVATING SUPPRESSION MODE>

Looks like it's chosen me as its target. That saves
me the trouble of getting its attention.

Eta did say that there is a certain way to make
commands appear here by using magic.
Um, Lady Alpha...!
No need to worry. You know my strength, right?
Y-Yes, I do... But this is my fault...
<COMMENCING SUPPRESSION>

The golem links its hands together, then swings them
upwards.
We can talk later—

It then swings them down at incredible speed,
like a hammer.

The powerful blow buckles the floor of the storehouse.
Cracks run through it in a spiderweb pattern.
I slip out of the center of the destruction.

I don't dodge to the left or right, or retreat to the
rear... No, I move forward.
Hyah!

Keeping my movements to a minimum, I dart in close to
the golem and knock it off its feet with a swift kick.

Losing its balance, the golem topples to the side,
flailing its arms and legs like an insect.

<POSTURE CONTROL ERROR>
<ACTIVATING POSTURE CORRECTION MODE>
It's time to end this!

I use this time to maneuver around behind the golem
and press the shutoff button hidden between its
armored plating.
<EMERGENCY SHUTDOWN>

Like a puppet whose strings have just been cut,
the golem falls still again.
L-Lady Alpha...you're incredible!
Gamma approaches me, relieved.
Be careful, the floor is—
Ack!!!

Before I can get the words out, Gamma's foot
slips into the hole the golem made.

And when she catches her balance against a nearby
shelf, all the boxes on it tumble down.
Oh, Oh nonono...! I'm...so sorry!!!

*sigh* Oh dear, more work to do. You see to the golem,
and I'll take care of this.
Okay...

The rapid-fire slip-ups seem to have finally sunk in,
because a now-chastened Gamma began quietly dragging
away the golem.

Your strength is very helpful at times like this.
Thank you.

I give her some words of encouragement as she goes
on her way, then start picking up the scattered boxes,
when...
My, what have we here...

The box contains several items of children's
clothing.

The simple garments were Beta's...and the ones with
ribbons and other decorative touches belonged to Epsilon.
This brings back memories...
These are for Beta too?! That's not fair at all!

I-It's because my clothes keep getting tight around
the chest so fast...
Grr!!!

O-Okay, I get it. I'll make do with Lady Alpha's
hand-me-downs...

Agh! That's not fair either! Lady Alpha has lots of
cute outfits!

Th-Then maybe you can take some hand-me-downs
from Delta...

Her old clothes are only fit to be tattered rags!
I'd rather die than wear those!
Then what am I supposed to do...

Now, now, you two... The point has been made,
so I'll buy some new clothes for you, too, Epsilon.
Really, Lady Alpha?!
Yay, I'm so happy! Ehehe!

And be sure to tell me right away if you feel your
clothes getting tight in the chest again, Beta.
Okay...

(The woes of growing girls... Since Cid's a boy,
it's hard to approach him about these topics.)

(That's why I have to step in to help! Although it does
make me nervous, since I'm by no means an expert
either...!)

Hehe, I've grown a lot since then. Beta and Epsilon,
as well.

Lady Alpha, I was able to get the golem put back,
incident-free this time... Oh?
Hm? Oh, I'm sorry. It seems I got a little distracted.

No, it's just that you were smiling so nicely. Almost
like...a kind mother wrapped in memories.
Oh dear, are you implying I'm old?

Eep! S-Sorry, I said too much! Please know that
I had no intention of...
Hehe, no, no, I'm just teasing you. Did it work?
M-My blood ran cold for a second...

In that case you're off the hook for this morning.
We'll call it even.

(The motherly face Gamma pointed out... I looked that
way because that's how I truly felt.)

(In those days, I did my best to try and be like
a mother to everyone.)

(Although, I feel that compared to back then,
I'm pulling off the mother role a little more
successfully now.)

Okay, the boxes are back in place...
Now, let's get some breakfast!
